content: what is the type of this adress   0408ab2f56361f83064e4ce51acc291fb57c2cbcdb1d6562f6278c43a1406b548fd6cefc11bcc29 eb620d5861cb9ed69dc39f2422f54b06a8af4f78c8276cfdc6bhttps://mempool.space/fr/address/0408ab2f56361f83064e4ce51acc291fb57c2cbcdb1d6562f6278c43a1406b548fd6cefc11bcc29eb620d5861cb9ed69dc39f2422f54b06a8af4f78c8276cfdc6b

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.created_time: September 03, 2024, 12:22:46 PMLast edit: September 03, 2024, 01:01:50 PM by Charles-Tim
comments.body: That is a public key and not address. Before P2PKH, it was P2PK which means pay to public key. Later, pay to addresses were implemented. Keys that are not compressed have public keys that start from 04. 02 and 03 for the ones that are compressed which HD wallets are generating.

comments.author: XtremeMed
comments.body: thanks u so much for explan
